GB.03: Egypt, Suez Canal, Great Bitter Lake, W-side, Sta.3; depth 9.20-10 m, muddy, with some coarse sand and gravel, covered with Sargassum (Plant zone 2); dredging; viii/ix.1950
Sta. MAU.080: Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin; 20°02'N 17°26'W; depth 60-70 m, gastropods, hermitcrabs, flatfish; 3.5 m Agassiz trawl; 14.vi.1988
Sta. MAU.054: Off Mauritania; 19°05'N 16°29'W; depth 30 m, small flatfish (soleids), gastropods; 2.4 m Agassiz trawl; 11.vi.1988
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.116 off Mauritania; 20°20'N 17°42'W; depth 105 m, muddy sand with crustaceans and tube worms; 1.2 m Agassiz trawl; 27.x.1978
